external_id.desc: A unique identifier of the view set by the developer. Must be unique for all views on a team. Max length of 255 characters. Either `view_id` or `external_id` is required.

hash.desc: A string that represents view state to protect against possible race conditions.

view.desc: A [view object](/reference/views). This must be a JSON-encoded string.

view_id.desc: A unique identifier of the view to be updated. Either `view_id` or `external_id` is required.

errors.duplicate_external_id: Error returned when the given `external_id` has already be used.
errors.hash_conflict: Error returned when the provided `hash` doesn't match the current stored value.
errors.not_found: Error returned when the given `view_id` or `external_id` doesn't exist.
errors.view_too_large: Error returned if the provided view is greater than 250kb.
